metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

properties.serializedData: {"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":"{\"json\":\"## Cross Component Correlations\\n---\\n\\nThis workbook shows how custom correlations can be done across App Insights components and Log Analytics for: \\n- Azure Functions\\n- Azure Service Bus\\n- Logic Apps\\n\"}","name":"text - 2"},{"type":9,"content":"{\"version\":\"KqlParameterItem/1.0\",\"crossComponentResources\":[\"value::all\"],\"parameters\":[{\"id\":\"95792dd9-c0cf-4c55-b321-79f146dd2e19\",\"version\":\"KqlParameterItem/1.0\",\"name\":\"appInsightsA\",\"label\":\"App Insights A\",\"type\":1,\"isRequired\":true,\"query\":\"where type =~ 'Microsoft.insights/components'\\n| project id, name\\n| where name contains 'fn-appinsights-a'\\n| order by name desc\\n| project name\",\"crossComponentResources\":[\"value::all\"],\"isHiddenWhenLocked\":true,\"queryType\":1,\"resourceType\":\"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources\"},{\"id\":\"11cacc96-2843-41fd-9aae-32c400147752\",\"version\":\"KqlParameterItem/1.0\",\"name\":\"appInsightsB\",\"label\":\"App Insights B\",\"type\":1,\"isRequired\":true,\"query\":\"where type =~ 'Microsoft.insights/components'\\r\\n| project id, name\\r\\n| where name contains 'fn-appinsights-b'\\r\\n| order by name desc\\r\\n| project name\",\"crossComponentResources\":[\"value::all\"],\"isHiddenWhenLocked\":true,\"queryType\":1,\"resourceType\":\"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources\"},{\"id\":\"ea8d8b97-25b8-4d92-acb5-4fcdea8d202a\",\"version\":\"KqlParameterItem/1.0\",\"name\":\"logAnalytics\",\"label\":\"Log Analytics\",\"type\":1,\"isRequired\":true,\"query\":\"where type =~ 'Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces'\\r\\n| project id, name\\r\\n| where name contains 'logic-loganalytics'\\r\\n| order by name desc\\r\\n| project name\",\"crossComponentResources\":[\"value::all\"],\"isHiddenWhenLocked\":true,\"queryType\":1,\"resourceType\":\"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources\"}],\"style\":\"above\",\"queryType\":1,\"resourceType\":\"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources\"}","name":"parameters - 4"},{"type":3,"content":"{\"version\":\"KqlItem/1.0\",\"query\":\"( app('{appInsightsA}').requests | union app('{appInsightsB}').requests | union app('{appInsightsA}').dependencies | union app('{appInsightsB}').dependencies | union app('{appInsightsA}').pageViews | union app('{appInsightsB}').pageViews)\\r\\n| extend MyCustomCorrId = tostring(customDimensions.MyCustomCorrId)\\r\\n| project timestamp, MyCustomCorrId, operation_Name\\r\\n| where  MyCustomCorrId != ''\\r\\n| distinct MyCustomCorrId\\r\\n| project-rename ['My Custom Correlation Id'] = MyCustomCorrId\",\"size\":1,\"title\":\"Correlation Identifiers - seen in last 30 days\",\"timeContext\":{\"durationMs\":2592000000},\"exportFieldName\":\"My Custom Correlation Id\",\"exportParameterName\":\"corrid\",\"queryType\":0,\"resourceType\":\"microsoft.insights/components\",\"crossComponentResources\":[\"/subscriptions/651dc44c-5d8e-48da-8cd3-cd79224ac290/resourceGroups/xstof-begim/providers/microsoft.insights/components/begim-fn-appinsights-b\",\"/subscriptions/651dc44c-5d8e-48da-8cd3-cd79224ac290/resourceGroups/xstof-begim/providers/microsoft.insights/components/begim-fn-appinsights-a\"],\"visualization\":\"table\"}","name":"query - 1"},{"type":3,"content":"{\"version\":\"KqlItem/1.0\",\"query\":\"let allApps = union app('{appInsightsA}').requests, app('{appInsightsB}').requests,\\r\\n              app('{appInsightsA}').dependencies, app('{appInsightsB}').dependencies,\\r\\n              app('{appInsightsA}').exceptions, app('{appInsightsB}').exceptions,\\r\\n              app('{appInsightsA}').traces, app('{appInsightsB}').traces,\\r\\n              app('{appInsightsA}').customEvents, app('{appInsightsB}').customEvents;\\r\\n// raw diagnostics for logic apps:\\r\\nlet LogicAppsDiagsRaw = \\r\\n  workspace('{logAnalytics}').AzureDiagnostics\\r\\n  | project-reorder startTime_t, status_s, OperationName, trackedProperties_Correlation_Context_s, trackedProperties_Request_Id_s, resource_runId_s;\\r\\n\\r\\n// build table for action completed event upon which tracked properties are stored; extracts custom_id and custom_parentid from those\\r\\nlet LogicAppsActionCompletedDiag = \\r\\n  LogicAppsDiagsRaw\\r\\n  | where OperationName == \\\"Microsoft.Logic/workflows/workflowActionCompleted\\\"\\r\\n  | parse kind = regex trackedProperties_Correlation_Context_s with * \\\"MyCustomCorrId=\\\" MyCustomCorrId:string\\r\\n  | project-rename custom_parentid=trackedProperties_Request_Id_s\\r\\n  | project-reorder  MyCustomCorrId, custom_parentid, trackedProperties_Correlation_Context_s;\\r\\n\\r\\n// build table that maps every custom correlation id back to a Logic Apps run id, for lookup later:\\r\\nlet MyCustomCorrIdMappingToResourceRunId = \\r\\n  LogicAppsActionCompletedDiag | where MyCustomCorrId != '' | where custom_parentid != '' | distinct MyCustomCorrId, resource_runId_s, custom_parentid;\\r\\n\\r\\n// use the above lookup table to stamp on every row the custom correlation id:\\r\\nlet LogicAppsDiagsWithCustomCorrIdStamped = \\r\\n  LogicAppsDiagsRaw\\r\\n  | lookup kind=leftouter MyCustomCorrIdMappingToResourceRunId on resource_runId_s\\r\\n  | project-reorder MyCustomCorrId, resource_runId_s, trackedProperties_Correlation_Context_s, custom_parentid, trackedProperties_Request_Id_s;\\r\\n\\r\\n// for every logic app action calculate the id and it's parent id:\\r\\nlet AllLogicActionsWithFilledCorrelationIds =\\r\\n  LogicAppsDiagsWithCustomCorrIdStamped\\r\\n  // custom_id for logic apps action is normally the concat of some props to make it unique\\r\\n  // the exception to this is when there is an\\r\\n  // action which does outbound call, on which a tracked property 'CustomActionExecutionId' is present\\r\\n  // the value of 'CustomActionExecutionId' will have been passed down in a message metadata or http header as the new outbound request-id\\r\\n  | extend custom_id = iif(trackedProperties_CustomActionExecutionId_s != '', trackedProperties_CustomActionExecutionId_s, strcat(resource_runId_s, Resource, OperationName))\\r\\n  | project-reorder  MyCustomCorrId, custom_parentid, resource_runId_s, trackedProperties_Correlation_Context_s;\\r\\n\\r\\n// merge logic apps data with data from app insights:\\r\\nlet fullTreeView =\\r\\n  allApps \\r\\n  | extend MyCustomCorrId = tostring(customDimensions.MyCustomCorrId) \\r\\n  | extend message_or_name = strcat(message, name)\\r\\n  | extend custom_id = id                            // by default for request and dependency telemetry, our custom id equals the normal id from the raw app insights logs\\r\\n  | extend custom_parentid = operation_ParentId      // by default for request and dependency telemetry, our custom parent id equals the normal operation_ParentId\\r\\n  | union (\\r\\n     AllLogicActionsWithFilledCorrelationIds\\r\\n     | extend itemType = 'workflowAction'\\r\\n     | extend message_or_name = strcat(trim_start('Microsoft.Logic/workflows/workflow', OperationName), ' - ', Resource, ' ', error_message_s)\\r\\n  )\\r\\n  | where  MyCustomCorrId == \\\"{corrid}\\\"\\r\\n  | extend custom_id = iif(custom_id == '', tostring(new_guid()), custom_id) // make sure id is unique (if not table will not be displayed correctly)\\r\\n  | project-reorder timestamp, itemType, custom_id, custom_parentid, message_or_name, appId\\r\\n  | project-away problemId, handledAt, assembly, method, outerType, outerMessage, outerAssembly, outerMethod, innermostType, innermostMessage, innermostAssembly, innermostMethod, client_City, client_StateOrProvince, client_CountryOrRegion, client_Browser, cloud_RoleName, cloud_RoleInstance, client_Model, client_OS, operation_SyntheticSource, session_Id, user_Id, user_AuthenticatedId, user_AccountId, application_Version, client_Type, message, name\\r\\n  | order by timestamp asc;\\r\\nfullTreeView\",\"size\":2,\"title\":\"Cross Component Traces for selected correlation id\",\"timeContext\":{\"durationMs\":2592000000},\"queryType\":0,\"resourceType\":\"microsoft.insights/components\",\"crossComponentResources\":[\"/subscriptions/651dc44c-5d8e-48da-8cd3-cd79224ac290/resourceGroups/xstof-begim/providers/microsoft.insights/components/begim-fn-appinsights-b\",\"/subscriptions/651dc44c-5d8e-48da-8cd3-cd79224ac290/resourceGroups/xstof-begim/providers/microsoft.insights/components/begim-fn-appinsights-a\"],\"visualization\":\"table\",\"gridSettings\":{\"formatters\":[{\"columnMatch\":\"timestamp\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"itemType\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"custom_id\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"id\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"custom_parentid\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"operation_ParentId\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"message_or_name\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"appId\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"source\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"url\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"success\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"resultCode\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"duration\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"performanceBucket\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"customDimensions\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"customMeasurements\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMatch\":\"operation_Name\",\"formatter\":0,\"formatOptions\":{\"showIcon\":true}},{\"columnMa workspace('{logAnalytics}').AzureDiagnostics\\r\\n  | project-reorder startTime_t, status_s, OperationName, trackedProperties_Correlation_Context_s, trackedProperties_Request_Id_s, resource_runId_s;\\r\\nlet LogicAppsActionCompletedDiag = \\r\\n  LogicAppsDiagsRaw\\r\\n  | where OperationName == \\\"Microsoft.Logic/workflows/workflowActionCompleted\\\"\\r\\n  | parse kind = regex trackedProperties_Correlation_Context_s with * \\\"MyCustomCorrId=\\\" MyCustomCorrId:string\\r\\n  | extend id=strcat(resource_runId_s, Resource, OperationName)\\r\\n  | project-rename operation_ParentId=trackedProperties_Request_Id_s\\r\\n  | project-reorder  MyCustomCorrId, operation_ParentId, trackedProperties_Correlation_Context_s;\\r\\nlet MyCustomCorrIdMappingToResourceRunId = \\r\\n  LogicAppsActionCompletedDiag \\r\\n  | where MyCustomCorrId != '' \\r\\n  | distinct MyCustomCorrId, resource_runId_s, operation_ParentId\\r\\n  | where operation_ParentId != '';\\r\\nlet LogicAppsDiagsWithCustomCorrIdStamped = \\r\\n  LogicAppsDiagsRaw\\r\\n  | lookup kind=leftouter MyCustomCorrIdMappingToResourceRunId on resource_runId_s\\r\\n  | project-reorder MyCustomCorrId, resource_runId_s, trackedProperties_Correlation_Context_s, operation_ParentId, trackedProperties_Request_Id_s;\\r\\nlet AllLogicActionsWithFilledCorrelationIds =\\r\\n
